title: 游戏无法正常启动
author: 辣条“
txt_content:
RT电脑系统win10x32

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Quite honestly, I wouldn't worry myself about that.

Time: 16-7-15 下午3:10
Description: Initializing game

org.lwjgl.LWJGLException: Pixel format not accelerated

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
辣条“ 发表于 2016-7-15 15:52
哦，我开启了兼容模式而已，不过都不行
自觉换独显试试。不行的话……换个Java或者直接换新显卡

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
org.lwjgl.LWJGLException: Pixel format not accelerated复制代码
调节/关闭硬件加速即可。
http://jingyan.baidu.com/article/454316aba6694df7a7c03aa8.html
http://zhidao.baidu.com/link?url ... m01Ik0AnGRJff1q9k2q

但是有个问题：
RT电脑系统win10x32
Operating System: Windows 7 (x86) version 6.1复制代码
这是什么梗？
